      • shardOperationOnReplica

        protected TransportReplicationAction.ReplicaResult shardOperationOnReplica(BasicReplicationRequest request)
        Description copied from class: TransportReplicationAction
        Synchronous replica operation on nodes with replica copies. This is done under the lock form TransportReplicationAction.acquireReplicaOperationLock(ShardId, long, ActionListener).
        Specified by:
        shardOperationOnReplica in class TransportReplicationAction<BasicReplicationRequest,BasicReplicationRequest,ReplicationResponse>

      • shouldExecuteReplication

        protected boolean shouldExecuteReplication(Settings settings)
        Description copied from class: TransportReplicationAction
        Indicated whether this operation should be replicated to shadow replicas or not. If this method returns true the replication phase will be skipped. For example writes such as index and delete don't need to be replicated on shadow replicas but refresh and flush do.
        Overrides:
        shouldExecuteReplication in class TransportReplicationAction<BasicReplicationRequest,BasicReplicationRequest,ReplicationResponse>
